original_title: Sri Lanka’s shares edge up in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s shares edged up in mid day trade on Wednesday, with the All Share Price Index was up by 0.75 percent or 72.14 points to 9,659.93.
The most liquid index, S&P SL20 was up 0.84 percent or 23.52 points to 2,833.51.
Top gainers during 113o hours were Hatton National Bank, National Development Bank and DFCC Bank. (Colombo/Mar16/2023)
